=== 2.0.0 ===
- Reorganized templates into psu_authorize folder
- psu_base templated reorganized

=== 1.1.2 ===
- Uncomment _DEFAULTS

=== 1.1.1 ===
- Rename app_code variable to selected_app on permission management
  template to avoid conflict with app_code in psu.util context

=== 1.1.0 ===
- Remove admin menu items

=== 1.0.4 ===
- Split global and local permissions into two separate tables
- Automated code cleanup

=== 1.0.3 ===
- Enforce length limits on application cods and titles

=== 1.0.2 ===
- Shortened dynamic role syntax

=== 1.0.1 ===
- Added some error handling and updated required psu_base version

=== 0.7.0 ===
- Nishna's UI changes

=== 0.6.2 ===
- Initial Release
